content: Social connection can lower anxiety and depression, help us regulate our emotions, lead to higher self-esteem and empathy, and actually improve our immune systems
Join a group focused on a favorite hobby, such as reading, hiking, or painting. Take a class to learn something new. Volunteer for things you care about in your community
